code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={tokens:[]};export var tokenSlice=createSlice({name:"tokens",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setTokens:function setTokens(state,action){state.tokens=action.payload;}}});var setTokens=tokenSlice.actions.setTokens;export{setTokens};export var selectTokens=function selectTokens(state){return state.tokens.tokens;};export default tokenSlice.reducer;
